ygData.subject: Re: SK Help ????
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Thanks for the info :)  Will look into that--My SK is only Level 17 atm so not even sure if she has the casting darkness spell yet. Right now I have
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "STG2(SW) Pierce" <piercer@d...>
wrote:
>
Thanks for the info :) Will look into that--My SK is only Level 17
atm so not even sure if she has the "casting darkness" spell yet.
Right now I have "clinging darkness" but alot of the higher level
mobs are resisting my spells and its really frustrating.
The weapon we have now is a Sporielli Defenders Blade??? it does 28
damage with +5 DEX but that is all---so I should go with a better
stat weapon?? with more HP/AC ???

Thanks !!!


> I forgot which spell ability casting darkness has but use that
one. That'll
> be your main aggro drawing spell (along with Terror/Fear-in the
upper 50s).
> When shopping for items remember that your main job is to tank,
take all the
> hits for the group so if a wep has anything with STA/AC/HP on it
use those.
> For the weapon you mentioned what kind of stats does it have?
> The stats will determine if you should use that over something with
high dmg
> and no stats. Like I said earlier the main ones you should focus
on are
> STA/AC/HP and STR/DEX to a lesser degree, anyone with WIS and CHA
is pretty
> much useless to this class.
>
> Duke Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Caelitus>
> Shadowknight of Innoruuk
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: lisa b [mailto:lisab38@h...]
> Sent: Wednesday, November 09, 2005 11:20 AM
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EverQuest] SK Help ????
>
>
> Hello All:
> I started an alt SK and wanted to know what is a good focus effect
for them
> if that makes sense. They don't seem to have any Direct Damage
spells that
> I could see on the spell list so that is out.
> Also, having a hard time finding a decent weapon for my SK. I have
one now
> that does 28 damage with no stats--should I go for lower damage and
more
> stats or stay with high damage and no stats. lololol.
>
> Thanks :)
>
>
>
>
> Death!!! Death to all who oppose Crushbone!!!
